meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Rabin Spira Mike Hodel Don Meals Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5994.

td.p: Sarah Rabin Spira, a preschool director from Washington, D.C.
Mike Hodel, a bartender from Bellingham, Washington
Don Meals, an environmental scientist from Burlington, Vermont (whose 3-day cash winnings total $42,599)

tr.td: THEY DRIVE ON THE LEFT
IF THE TV SERIES HAD A DOWNER ENDING
CLUB TED
THE GREAT SEAL OF THE U.S.
DOUBLE D's

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
